  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttachmentListView  
    AvatarGroupView<STYLE extends BaseStyle>  
    BaseStyle  
    ChannelHeaderView  
    ChannelHeaderViewStyle  
    ChannelListView  
    ChannelListViewStyle  
    MessageInputView
    Rich Message Input View component, allows you to: - type messages - run slash commands - emoticons - file uploads - send typing events
    MessageListView
    MessageListView renders a list of messages and extends the RecyclerView The most common customizations are - Disabling Reactions - Disabling Threads - Customizing the click and longCLick (via the adapter) - The list_item_message template to use (perhaps, multiple ones...?)
    MessageListViewStyle  
    ReadStateView<STYLE extends BaseStyle>
